sentences.en: Grilled trout needs only a squeeze of lemon.
sentences.cn: 烤鳟鱼只需要一点柠檬榨汁。

sentences.en: He fished the stream for trout.
He is interested in the cultivation of trout in ponds.
He reeled in a big trout.
sentences.cn: 他绕起钓丝,钓起一条大鳟鱼.

sentences.en: I caught seven trout in fifteen minutes.
sentences.cn: 我十五分钟内捉到七条鳟鱼.

sentences.en: I pulled and felt the live weight of the trout and then the line throbbed again.
sentences.cn: 我用手去拉,感觉到一条活蹦蹦的鳟鱼的重量,随后线又是有规则地跳动着.

sentences.en: Shall we have trout for dinner?

sentences.cn: 熏鲑鱼 、 冰西瓜, 要什么饮料?

sentences.en: The lake is abundant in trout.
The not quite literal translation of this phrase is: that old trout.
sentences.cn: 这个词条大致上可以译为: 那个老家伙.

sentences.en: These turtles kill fish -- especially trout.
sentences.cn: 这些乌龟专会吃鱼 -- 尤其是“鳟鱼. ”
他们正演奏着舒伯特的《鳟鱼五重奏》.

sentences.en: Thousands of trout fishermen have never seen a brook trout that scaled six pounds.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的鳟鱼垂钓者还从未见过重6磅的河鳟鱼.

sentences.en: We did not run at all short of fresh trout at the excellent meals.
sentences.cn: 在我们丰盛味美的饭餐中,从未缺少过新鲜的鳟鱼.

sentences.en: We hooked a trout and had it for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我们钓了一条鳟鱼,早饭时吃了.

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)讨人嫌（或脾气暴躁）的老人（尤指老年妇女）

trans.tran_en: a common river-fish, often used for food, or the flesh of this fish
